title: Is wudu required to touch Islamic books with surahs or ayahs of Quran: books of hadith, fiqh? Assim
transcript: bucker from Saudi Arabia says that if we have books like books of Hadith books of that include verses of the Quran or maybe suras of the Quran must be must we be in the state of wood Evolution When We Touch these books the answer is no you can touch them without a problem
